tooltip.customfog.linearslider: The percentage of your render distance to start the linear fog fade out at.
tooltip.customfog.linearendslider: The percentage of your render distance to end the linear fog fade out at.
tooltip.customfog.expslider: The density of fog when in EXPONENTIAL fog mode.
tooltip.customfog.exp2slider: The density of fog when in EXPONENTIAL_TWO fog mode.
tooltip.customfog.pushtouniversal: Push config to server as universal override (requires op)
notice.customfog.overridden2: This config is overridden by the server!
notice.customfog.sodiumfog3: Fog Occlusion in Sodium's Advanced settings!
notice.customfog.slidervalue2: To set a slider to a value outside its normal range,
notice.customfog.slidervalue3: click on it, then type in the new value!
